mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_unmempayment ( order_no, receiver_name, receiver_phone, receiver_zipcode, receiver_address1, receiver_address2, delivery_memo,order_name, order_phone, order_pw, total_price ) VALUES ( #{order_no}, #{receiver_name}, #{receiver_phone}, #{receiver_zipcode}, #{receiver_address1}, #{receiver_address2}, #{delivery_memo},#{order_name}, #{order_phone}, #{order_pw}, #{total_price} )

INSERT INTO tb_mempayment ( order_no, mem_id,receiver_name, receiver_phone, receiver_zipcode, receiver_address1, receiver_address2, delivery_memo, total_price, used_point, cp_no ) VALUES ( #{order_no}, #{mem_id}, #{receiver_name}, #{receiver_phone}, #{receiver_zipcode}, #{receiver_address1}, #{receiver_address2}, #{delivery_memo}, #{total_price}, #{used_point}, #{cp_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT d.p_title, d.p_category, d.p_img, d.p_price, c.*, NVL(e.cp_name, '쿠폰사용 안함') as cp_name,NVL( e.cp_price,0) as cp_price FROM( SELECT a.order_no, a.order_date,a.total_price,a.used_point, a.receiver_name, a.receiver_address1, a.receiver_address2, a.delivery_memo, a.receiver_phone, b.p_count, b.p_no, b.order_status,NVL(a.cp_no,'0') as cp_no FROM tb_mempayment a, tb_mempaymentdetail b where a.mem_id = #{mem_id} AND a.order_no = b.order_no ORDER BY order_date DESC ) c , tb_product d, tb_coupon e WHERE c.p_no = d.p_no and c.cp_no = e.cp_no(+)

SELECT NVL(SUM(DECODE(order_status, '취소', 1, NULL)), 0) AS cancle_count, NVL(SUM(DECODE(order_status, '상품 준비중', 1, NULL)),0) AS ready_count, NVL(SUM(DECODE(order_status, '배송완료', 1, NULL)),0) AS complete_count, NVL(SUM(DECODE(order_status, '배송중', 1, NULL)),0) AS delivery_count, NVL(SUM(DECODE(order_status, '반품', 1, NULL)),0) AS return_count FROM TB_MEMPAYMENTDETAIL WHERE ORDER_NO IN ( SELECT order_no FROM tb_mempayment WHERE mem_id = #{mem_id} )
